post:
Hello, LET community!
 
Powerful and unmanaged Australian Dedicated Server ALL INCLUSIVE @ USD 60/month (or AUD 81/month including GST).
 
#The DEAL:
 
* Lifetime offer (Advertised price is recurring)
* Hosted in Sydney, Australia 
* All-inclusive pricing at 80.29 AUD/ month (60 USD/month)
* No lock-in contracts (pay month to month)
* No setup fees
* While stock lasts
* SATA disks or upgrade to SSD for free (very limited quantities)
 
 
#Dedicated Server specifications:
 
* CPU: Intel Xeon E3-1245 v5 - 4c/8t - 3.5GHz /3.9GHz
* RAM: 32GB DDR4 2133MHz
* Disks: SoftRAID 2x2TB or upgrade to SSD (2x480GB) for free but very limited quantities!
* Uplink: 5000 GB traffic/month at 250Mbps guaranteed bandwidth (1Gbps port) or upgrade to unlimited traffic
* Downlink: 1Gbps port – Unmetered
 
Are you based in?
* Australia/NZ (AUD): https://www.ovh.com.au/dedicated-servers/enterprise/1806do01.xml
* Asia/India (USD): https://www.ovh.com/asia/dedicated-servers/enterprise/1806do01.xml
* Singapore (SGD): https://www.ovh.com/sg/dedicated-servers/enterprise/1806do01.xml
* else visit -> https://www.ovh.com/world/dedicated-servers/enterprise/1806do01.xml
 
 
#Services and Benefits included in the rental price of your server:
 
* Anti-DDoS Pro: https://www.ovh.com.au/anti-ddos
* 500 GB of backup storage offered (in our Canadian Datacenter)
* Root access to the server
* Intelligent Platform Management Interface (IPMI)
* User-friendly Control Panel
* API https://ca.api.ovh.com/
* Over 90 operating systems and licenses
* 1 IPv4 included. Add additional IPs (up to 256) with NO MONTHLY FEES!! US$3 fee/IPv4)
* IPv6 /64 (native) included
 
 
#Need more data?
 
* Upgrade to Unlimited Traffic @ 100Mbps - Extra  US$123 (or AU$160) per month
* Upgrade to Unlimited Traffic @ 250Mbps - Extra US$214 or (AU$290) per month
 
 
#Looking for an even more powerful server in Australia? 
 
consult the available list here: https://www.ovh.com.au/dedicated-servers/prices/ 
 
 
##Test the OVH network performance
 
Datacenter: Sydney, Australia:
 
* Test IPv4: speedtest-syd.apac-tools.ovh
* Test IPv6: speedtest-syd.apac-tools.ovh
* Test files: http://speedtest-syd.apac-tools.ovh/files
* Test latency: http://syd.smokeping.ovh.net/smokeping?target=APAC
* Looking Glass: https://lg.ovh.net
* Network status: http://weathermap.ovh.net/#apac
 
 
> #About OVH
OVH is a global cloud provider, offering innovative products and services with a focus on private, public and hybrid cloud, and bare metal (dedicated servers).
Founded in 1999, the OVH group manages and maintains 28 datacentres across 4 continents, deploys its own global fiber-optic network, and has full control over the supply chain (from server manufacturing and in-house maintenance of its infrastructure, right down to customer support). OVH offers businesses a benchmark for value and performance in the sector.
